name: Skateboard Games Skate Park Flaming Hawks Skater Skating Freestyle Game
name_original: Skateboard Games Skate Park Flaming Hawks Skater Skating Freestyle Game
description:
The skates have amazing powers! Speeding Up, Jumping performing various tricks in the air and landing safety. Impress your friends by performing tricks.
Dash through the urban jungle and collect gold. Do not collide with any obstacles. Skateboard Games is going to last forever and keep you on your toes and excited all the time. Feel the adrenalin pumping as you skate the way you want!


How to Play:-
Swipe your iPhone/iPad to slide & jump.
Tilt to control.
